vote.title: A resolution authorizing (1) the conveyance of a tract of land; and (2) the execution of a Possession and Use Agreement of approximately 7,948 square feet of City-owned land to the State of Texas located near the intersection of Cadiz and Hotel Streets - Revenue: General Capital Reserve Fund ($782,528.00) and General Fund ($7,500.00)
